items.q: While digging in Minoan Crete, archaeologists have found some of the first ____ ever used. a. bath tubs b. knives and forks c. copper dishes d. silver plates
The next step after the Ancient Greeks bathed was ____ their bodies with ash and oil. a. repressing b. anointment of c. steaming d. punishing
The Ancient Romans ____. a. bathed only at home b. had many public baths c. did not permit public bathing d. did not permit women in public baths

One way the Japanese show their strict rules about hygiene is by ____. a. eating only vegetarian meals b. bathing twice a day c. removing their shoes before entering a house d. taking a bath before each meal
In both the Muslim and Jewish religions, cleanliness has religious overtones . In this sentence, the word overtones mean ____. a. controls b. meanings c. celebrations d. retreats
During the Middle Ages, common Europeans could not afford baths so diseases were ____. a. eliminated b. rampant c. easily controlled d. decreasing
After the Romans permitted men and women to bathe together, the baths lost their virtuous purpose. The word virtuous means ____. a. religious b. practical c. pure d. big

When you introduce cleaner fish into an aquarium infested with fungi, the cleaner fish will ____. a. kill all the other fish b. keep the other fish healthy c. eat all the other fish d. eat all the food
Many fish would be in imminent danger if cleaner fish did not clean them . In this sentence, the word imminent means ____. a. future b. immediate c. continuous d. none
The main purpose of cleaning symbiosis is ____. a. to establish friendly relations between different species b. to share food c. for reproduction d. to kill parasites on the animal being cleaned
Limbaugh ____ the habits of cleaner fish in the Bahamas. a. ran afoul of b. was able to assess c. undulated d. peaked
In the Middle Ages, the clothing commoners wore was often ____ with vermin. a. cleaned b. infested c. repressed d. indulged

The conclusion of a 5-paragraph definition essay contains ____. a. the thesis statement and word defined in the essay b. your personal definition and a concluding comment c. only the literal definition of the word discussed d. a summary of two body paragraphs

A surprising thing about the black sturgeon fish is ____. a. it changes color while it is being cleaned b. it shares its food with other species c. they don't have parasites d. they don't use cleaner fish
Fish that are cleaned must often ____ so the cleaners can do their work. a. peak b. perform c. line up d. assess
Archeologists have discovered soaplike material dating back to about _____. a. 1000 B.C.E. b. 2000 B.C.E. c. 3000 B.C.E d. 5000 B.C.E
The first step in a Roman bath was _____. a. plunging into a cool pool of water b. scraping the skin c. splashing with water d. sweating in a warm room
The last step in a Middle Eastern bath is _____. a. sitting in a steamy room b. lying down c. rubbing the body with a hard towel d. soaping and rinsing
If you indulge in an activity, you _____. a. stop doing it b. avoid doing it c. think about doing it d. do it a lot
If you repress something, you _____. a. don’t do it b. treat it as a luxury c. consider it a virtue d. find it relaxing
Boasting is _____. a. using oils to cleanse your body b. discouraging cleanliness c. saying good things about yourself d. doing spiritual purification
If you are myopic, you _____. a. are blind b. can’t see things that are close to you c. keep your eyes closed all the time d. can’t see things that are far away
Assessing a situation involves _____ it. a. judging b. avoiding c. approaching d. appreciating
Undulation is a type of _____. a. marine species b. movement c. symbiosis d. cleaning behavior
Which fish attracts other fish by “dancing”? a. the Topsmelt b. the Wrasse c. the Black Bas d. the Opaleye
The Black Sturgeon turns _____ when it is cleaned by a cleaner fish. a. black b. blue c. pink d. brown
The Cleaner Fish or Wrasse Fish that lives off the coast of California attracts clients by quickly opening and closing its mouth.
The Crusaders brought the Middle Eastern use of therapeutic thermal baths to the Europeans.
Americans are not offended by body odor.
In the 1800's, Americans and Europeans improved sanitation standards because they realized that filth caused disease.
The Senorita Fish lives off the coast of California.
Normally aggressive fish like sharks and barracudas do not permit cleaner fish to clean them.
An extended definition is used when a word can be interpreted more than one way.
The literal meaning of a word is rarely found in the dictionary.
The introduction in a definition essay includes the terms you will define.
The thesis statement in a definition essay includes only one aspect of the topic you will discuss.
In the past, bathing was considered a medicinal treatment.
The Ancient Egyptians were expert plumbers.
If something is grave, it is very serious.
A retreat is a place where people go to get away from their everyday lives.
Symbiosis benefits both parties involved.
If you fall foul of something, it causes a problem for you.
Salt water is an inviable environment for sharks.
Parasites can cause infected wounds.
The moray eel is normally an aggressive species.
There are at least 45 species of fish that act as cleaners of other fish.
Does the paragraph contain a "literal" or "extended" definition of the word "success?"
In what ways does the introductory paragraph follow the rules for a definition essay?
Write a conclusion for this definition essay introduction. Include the rules for conclusions in a definition essay.
Write an essay about your personal definition of success.
